metadata.name: Dreamer
metadata.description:
Dreamer by Wayak

Dreamer is a song of reconciliation between my dreams and reality. 
The dream is clear, the road unknown but my mind is made up and I know I need to start walking towards it with the knowledge available. 
In trust that my purpose is pure and my intentions are well aligned, I start my journey.

Dreamer is the first of an 8 song album called Chasing Light.

Lyrics:  
 I was laying in my bed 
I was dreaming home  
 I was screaming in my head 
I was dreaming home  
 I was thinking what to say 
I was dreaming home  
 I was an easy prey  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home

I was dreaming home  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home

I was insisting 
Dreamer dreaming home  
 I was resisting 
Dreamer dreaming home  
 I was in a mind parade  
 I was dreaming home  
 I had no more time to play  
 I was dreaming home

I was dreaming home 
I was a dreamer dreaming home  
 I was dreaming home  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home

Didn't know where I belong  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home 
Didn't know what's right or wrong  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home 
Didn't know where I belong 
I was a dreamer dreaming home 
Didn't know what's right or wrong  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home  
I was dreaming home  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home  
 I was dreaming home 
I was a dreamer dreaming home  
 I was dreaming home  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home  
 I was dreaming home  
 I was a dreamer dreaming home


Disclaimer: 
This is a 1-to-1 replacement of the Polygon version of this song, originally minted on Mintsongs.
